item.title: Electronic Clock II - Generating the Clock Signal pt.1
item.description: In the previous installment of this series, I spoke about the requirements and the architecture of the clock. In this installment, I’m going to engineer the clock signal generator, the most crucial part of our clock ###Importance of the Signal in a clock Every clock is only as accurate as it’s signal. An atomic clock uses radiations emitted by cesium-133 as it’s signal, a quartz clock uses a 32768 Hz quartz crystal as it’s signal whereas a mechanical clock uses an Escapement powered by a hairspring (in wristwatches) or by a pendulum (in clocks).
